mapper.delete: delete from likes where song_id = #{songId} and id = #{id}
mapper.select: select so.song_id, a.album_image, so.title, si.singer_name, a.album_name, count(l.song_id) as likes, so.song_path, so.video_link from songs so join albums a on so.album_id = a.album_id join singers si on so.song_id = si.song_id join likes l on so.song_id = l.song_id group by so.song_id, a.album_image, so.title, si.singer_name, a.album_name, so.song_path, so.video_link order by count(l.song_id) desc

select a.album_image, so.title, si.singer_name, a.album_name, count(l.song_id) as likes, so.song_path, so.video_link from songs so join albums a on so.album_id = a.album_id join singers si on so.song_id = si.song_id join likes l on so.song_id = l.song_id where genre = #{genre} group by a.album_image, so.title, si.singer_name, a.album_name, so.song_path, so.video_link order by count(l.song_id) desc
